https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dNRgM1ONRSj8rswRH78JZB8ZClI.jpg At 25, Berthe dreams of making a living from her painting, never to marry, and to always stay with her sister Edma. Her parents do not see things from the same angle. Then Berthe meets Edouard Manet, who takes an interest in this young artist apprentice whose face inspires him. Berthe Morisot
